content.text: To rear your newly found bees into a bee family brimming with honey you'll need a bee house or an apiary. These small wooden boxes can contain a family of these little blighters, and collect honeycombs for your troubles.

The bee house was one of my earliest discoveries. The discovery of this small bee housing was more like a coincidence. I forgot a honey comb in a small wooden box that I had crafted out of some wooden planks and wooden slabs. After a while the box was full with bees, they had started to build there home in this box. I crafted a simmelar box like I had crafted before, placed a comb in it and named it "Bee House".
